content.question: The Spanish actions described in the passage differed from European attempts to promote Christianity in South and East Asia in the period 1450â€“1750 in that

choices.label: in South and East Asia, Europeans relied on established minority groups for help in spreading Christianity
in South and East Asia, Europeans were unable to subjugate politically the powerful existing states
in South and East Asia, Europeans encountered strong local resistance and mass revolts against their attempts to establish political and cultural uniformity
in South and East Asia, Europeans became too closely involved in local sectarian conflicts to be able to effectively promote Christianity

content.answer: in South and East Asia, Europeans were unable to subjugate politically the powerful existing states

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
